} }) // returns 5: false var undef var key var i var len var emptyValues = [undef, null, false, 0, '', '0'] for (i = 0, len = emptyValues.length; i < len; i++) { if (mixedVar === emptyValues[i]) { return true } } if (typeof mixedVar === 'object') { for (key in mixedVar) { if (mixedVar.hasOwnProperty(key)) { return false } } return true } return false } {% endcodeblock %}
